cs2410.assn8.view

Class ScoreBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs2410.assn8.view.ScoreBoard

  • public class ScoreBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the winning and losing messages as well the audio. Counts the number of neighbors a cell has.

                           Cell cell,
                           int height,
                           int width)
        Calculates the number of bombs surrounding a cell.
        Parameters:
        arr - 2D array of cells.
        cell - Current cell being calculated.
        height - Height of the array.
        width - Width of the array.
        Returns:
        Number of bombs surronding a cell.
